title: Absurdism and Camus
description: A 60-second lesson on Absurdism and Camus.

hook.text: The universe is silent and indifferent. We desperately want meaning. It offers none.

buildup.text: Albert Camus called this clash between human need and cosmic silence 'the absurd.'
